page.title: 09MAIN CLUBS IN LT.GADDESDEN
page.content: The Gaddesden Society is the mother of all societies in this village.The members meet once a month in the Winter.Also it publishes the Gaddesden Diary which gives imformation on the events happening in each club. The Art Club meets every week on a Monday. The Drama Club was started in 1948.It puts on 2 to 3 plays a year. The Village Produce Association was started in 1948.It now has a shop next to the Village Hall.The V.P.A. also has an annual Summer and Winter show. The Brownie Pack is now run by Anne Webster and Julie Leonhardt. Mr.Wiggins runs the Scouts and Cubs behind the Village Hall. Dr.Cassell runs the Music Club. Every month they get professional music players to play to the members.
